definition: to return to one's home country
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: This is the first solo exhibition of Ding Li upon his return to home from his study at L'ecole des Beaux-Arts in France.
sentences.chinese: 這是丁力自巴黎藝術學院畢業回國後的第一個個展。

sentences.english: The soldiers posted abroad in 2001 rotated home last year.
sentences.chinese: 2001年派駐國外的士兵去年輪換調防回國。

sentences.english: He got his Master of Asian studies from Lund University in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 沈亮在回國創業前在瑞典隆德大學獲得碩士學位。

sentences.english: Qian was immediately allowed to establish an Institute of Mechanics in Beijing, and to work within the state -established Chinese Academy of Science.
sentences.chinese: 錢回國後隨即在北京建立力學院，並創建中國科學院。

sentences.english: Both the United Nations and the United States are upset about Dostum's return.
sentences.chinese: 但聯合國和美國對杜斯塔姆的回國感到不安。

sentences.english: Canda has made some secret business deal with China in exchange for sending this man back home.
sentences.chinese: 把這人送回國去，是加拿大跟中國私底下有交易。

sentences.english: And in the studies after returning home, I will be even more full play to their ability.
sentences.chinese: 並且在學成回國後，我將更加充分的發揮自己的能力。

sentences.english: Where a diplomat stationed abroad leaves his post and returns to his country, his rank shall be terminated correspondingly.
sentences.chinese: 駐外外交人員離任回國，其銜級相應終止。

sentences.english: After returning home she held solo exhibitions many times in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 回國後多次在上海舉行個人油畫展。

sentences.english: After he got the Doctor's Dearee of Meteorology, he returned to China.
sentences.chinese: 獲得氣象學博士學位後，竺可楨回國。

sentences.english: But Rong Hong returned only to find a poverty-stricken country under a corrupt government.
sentences.chinese: 容閎回國後，看到了清政府的腐朽落後和國家的貧困。

sentences.english: Out organization has effectuated the return to their countries of all the political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 我們的組織已達成遣送所有政治犯回國。

sentences.english: Gillard's Apricot Kernels will be short-lived, with Rudd due to return to Artificial Turf late Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 但吉拉德的升職只是短暫的，陸克文週四晚就會回國。

sentences.english: However, after his return, 26-year-old Wang was no better prepared to find work.
sentences.chinese: 但回國後，26歲的王建海在求職時可以說毫無準備。

sentences.english: Is ready to return in his country Marcos Assuncao (31), former midfield of Roma and Betis Sevilla.
sentences.chinese: 前羅馬和貝蒂斯中場馬克思阿松桑準備回國。

sentences.english: And Mr. Green will make another appointment when Mr. Wang comes back.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生回國後再和王經理安排另一個見面。

definition: to go abroad/to leave the country/emigration
student studying abroad/(foreign) exchange student/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
